Basic Glove that provides a small amount of defense
but also allows the user to scan their surroundings.

note:
<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);
}
</Before Eval>

description: User's \c[6]Charge\c[0] Attribute remains filled after battle.
name: Backup Charge Capacitor

description:
Very lightweight Doctor's coat. 
Doesn't provide much protection.
name: Doctor's Coat

description: Normal pants, nothing special.
name: Civilian Pants

description: Ugly shoes that have been around for centuries
name: Crocks

description: Standard issue kevlar pants.
name: Kevlar Pants

description: Standard boots made of a synthetic leatherette.
name: Pleather Boots

description:
Standard Issue Beltainian Armor with Stem Cell regenerator built in.
(Skill: \c[6]Stem Cell Regeneration\c[0])
name: B1 Beltain Armor

description: Converts Power into Charge.
name: Power Inverter

description: Converts Charge into Power.
name: Charge Inverter

description:
Boots made from a fused layer of rock. Very uncomfortable and heavy.
Provides good defense but slows the user down.
name: Rock Boots

description:
Doesn't provide much protection but can 
continuously charge the user's power cells. \c[6]200% Power Capacity\c[0].
name: B1 Battery Armor

description:
Basic cyber armor that can protect the integrity of 
the user's data.
name: 1-X Cyber Security Firewall

description: Decreases the negative effects of Polaron Weapons by 30%.
name: KRP-1 Polaron Implant

description: Ship armor with self-healing properties.
name: RG-1 Regenerative Plating

description: Standard issue torso plating for androids.
name: A1 - Torso Plating

description: Nothing much to it. The size is a little weird for a human to wear.
name: Android Cloak

description:
Replaces the factory default android footwear. 
Provides an agility and armor boost.
name: F1 Android Footwear

description: Increases the user's attack, defense, and agility by a small amount. A well rounded implant.
name: Tactical Implant 14-A

description: Constantly repairs the cells of the user increasing their health by 120%.
name: L1 Nanobot Implant

description: Increases the defense of the user by temporarily disabling the body's pain receptors.
name: S1 Shield Implant

description: Uses the body's own energy to convert into usable power for equipment. (\c[6]Power 120%\c[0])
name: V1 Power Implant

description:
Increases testosterone levels in the user.
More muscle bulk, but slows the user down.
name: TS-1 Testosterone Implant

description: Lightweight and comfortable, doesn't provide much protection.
name: Kryll Garment

description: Provides no protection but increases the speed of the user
name: Sonic Shoes

description: Ridiculous looking pants, doesn't provide much defense...
name: Kryll Parachute Pants

description: A plain civilian hat.
name: Nanofiber Hat

description: A helmet made of a hard/stretchable fungus.
name: Mushroom Helmet

description: Does not provide much protection but it's worth a fortune...
name: Gold Chainmail

description: Provides an extra level of defense for the user, slows the user down.
name: PS1 - Personal Shield

description: Top of the line armor for the ESA guard.

description: Heavy Helmet for Military Officers.
name: GX-99 Combat Helm

description: State of the art tactical pants of the ESA.

description: Cutting edge tactical jackboots of the ESA.
name: GX-99 Tactical Boots

description: Boots made of a hard fungus material
name: Mushroom Boots

description: A tunic made of a hard/stretchable fungus.
name: Mushroom Tunic

description: Makes the user resistant to general purpose mind control technology.

description:
Heavy armor made with synthetic hard mushroom shells...

name: Synthetic Mushroom Boots

description: Provides an extra level of defense for the user, slows the user down.
name: PS2 - Personal Shield

description: A model of armor that provides superior defense, with no frills.
name: Dragon Skin

description: Provides almost no protection but increases the user's agility by \c[6]20%\c[0]
name: Hydraulic Boots

description:
Constantly repairs the cells of the user increasing their health by 120%.
Low level of protection.
name: NB-1 Nanobot Armor

description:
Basic cyber armor that can protect the integrity of

description: Kelvana Junker armor. Protects the user pretty well but slows them down significantly
name: Kelvana Junker Armor

description: Pants made from the leather of some reptile.

description: Boots made of junk armor parts. Provides good protection, slows the user down.
name: Kelvana Junker Boots

description:
A device that accelerates the speed of time for the user,
giving them an edge in speed.
name: Temporal Accelerator

description:
Jolts an unconscious synthetic lifeform back to life. 
(\c[3]50% HP Recovery\c[0]. \c[10]Only works on synthetic lifeforms\c[0].)
name: Jumper Jolter
note:
<throw object: before>
 image: icon 494
 duration: 20
 arc: 60
spin: 16
</throw object>

<action sequence: execute>
motion: user, 1, 1, 120
wait: user, 10
icon: user, icon 772, 2, 24, -24, 255, 90
wait: user, 20
animation: user, 159
wait: user, 80
se: play, ELECTRIX, 100, 80, 0
action: all targets, effect
wait: all targets, action
wait: user, 4
icon: user, clear, 2
</action sequence> 

===ANIMATION WHEN RETURNING====
<action sequence: return>
move: user, to home, 8
wait: user, move
motion: user, reset 
</action sequence>
